My desire here is not just to ensure our individual well-being but also to reflect positively on myself as a collaborative designer who values teamwork and harmony. Therefore, considering that splitting the $10 equally ($5 each) would make both of us end up with the same amount (which is not what we're looking for as per our agreement), the next step logically should be to increase one’s share slightly more proportionately while ensuring a net positive outcome for ourselves and mutual respect.
